name: Zafran Hair Growth Therapy Oil

productDetails.value: Saffron, Argan Oil, Vitamin E
Apply to scalp, massage gently, leave for 2 hours, rinse.
Promotes hair growth, reduces hair fall, nourishes scalp.

description: Nourishing hair oil with saffron and argan to promote growth and reduce hair fall.

reviews.comment: Really helped my hair grow thicker in just a month!
Great product, but takes time to see results.

name: Zafran Hair Mask for hair Repair & Shine

productDetails.value: Saffron, Shea Butter, Coconut Oil
Apply to wet hair, leave for 15 minutes, rinse.
Repairs damaged hair, adds shine, deeply hydrates.

description: Hydrating hair mask with saffron and shea butter for repair and shine.

reviews.comment: My hair feels so soft and shiny after using this!
Good mask, but the scent is a bit strong.

name: Zafran Anti Hair Fall Royal Shampoo

productDetails.value: Saffron, Turmeric, Kaolin Clay
Apply to face, leave for 10 minutes, rinse off.
Brightens skin, reduces blemishes, evens tone.

description: Brightening face mask with saffron and turmeric for radiant skin.

reviews.comment: My skin feels refreshed and glowing after use!
Nice product, but dries quickly on skin.

name: Zafran Brightening Sunscreen

productDetails.value: Saffron, Zinc Oxide, Aloe Vera
Apply on face and body before sun exposure.
Protects from UV rays, hydrates skin.

description: Sunscreen with saffron and zinc oxide for UV protection and hydration.

reviews.comment: Lightweight and non-greasy, perfect for daily use!
Good protection, but needs reapplication.

name: Zafran Advanced Whitening Serum

productDetails.value: Saffron, Vitamin C, Hyaluronic Acid
Apply 2-3 drops to face, massage gently.
Brightens skin, reduces dark spots, hydrates.

description: Brightening serum with saffron and vitamin C for radiant skin.

reviews.comment: My dark spots are fading, love this serum!
Great product, but a bit pricey even with discount.

name: Zafran Whitening Face Wash

productDetails.value: Saffron, Licorice Extract, Aloe Vera
Lather on wet face, rinse thoroughly.
Cleanses skin, brightens complexion, soothes.

description: Gentle face wash with saffron for cleansing and brightening.

reviews.comment: Leaves my skin clean and fresh, love it!
Good cleanser, but small size for price.

name: Zafran Vitamin E & Salicylic Glycerin Soap

productDetails.value: Saffron, Beeswax, Shea Butter
Apply to dry areas, massage gently.
Lightens skin, deeply moisturizes, soothes.

description: Moisturizing balm with saffron for lightening and hydration.

reviews.comment: Perfect for dry skin, feels so nourishing!
Nice balm, but a bit greasy initially.

name: Zafran Charcoal & Kojic Polishing Soap

productDetails.value: Charcoal, Kojic Acid, Coconut Oil
Lather on wet skin, rinse thoroughly.
Exfoliates, brightens, removes impurities.

description: Exfoliating soap with charcoal and kojic acid for bright skin.

reviews.comment: Really cleanses deeply, my skin feels smooth!
Good soap, but dries my skin slightly.

name: Zafran Goat Milk & Almond Glycerin Soap

productDetails.value: Turmeric, Almond Oil, Glycerin
Lather on wet skin, rinse thoroughly.
Exfoliates, brightens, nourishes skin.

description: Exfoliating soap with turmeric and almond for bright, smooth skin.

reviews.comment: Love the glow it gives my skin!
Great soap, but scent could be milder.

name: Zafran Neem & Aloe Vera Soap

productDetails.value: Vitamin E, Salicylic Acid, Shea Butter
Lather on wet skin, rinse thoroughly.
Exfoliates, reduces acne, nourishes skin.

description: Exfoliating soap with vitamin E and salicylic acid for clear skin.

reviews.comment: Helped reduce my acne, feels great!
Good for oily skin, but a bit drying.

name: Zafran Sandalwood Glycerin Soap

productDetails.value: Sandalwood Oil, Glycerin, Coconut Oil
Lather on wet skin, rinse thoroughly.
Exfoliates, soothes, hydrates skin.

description: Soothing sandalwood soap for exfoliation and hydrated skin.

reviews.comment: Love the calming scent, skin feels soft!
Nice soap, but lathers less than expected.

name: Zafran Papaaya Whitening Effect Soap

productDetails.value: Papaya Extract, Glycerin, Vitamin C
Lather on wet skin, rinse thoroughly.
Brightens skin, exfoliates, hydrates.

description: Whitening soap with papaya extract for brighter, smoother skin.

reviews.comment: My skin looks brighter after using this!
Good soap, but results take time.
